Carlos Montez Melancia (21 August 1927 – 23 October 2022) was a Portuguese politician who was the Governor of Macau from 9 July 1987 to 22 April 1992.

Biography
Melancia was born in Alpiarça, Santarém District, Portugal in 1927.<ref>[http://www.geneall.net/P/per_page.php?id=468042 Date of Birth]</ref> In 1992,"The life of seven ex-Governors of Macau in Portugal". (30 April 2007). Macau Daily News.</ref>

Melancia was the godson of José Relvas, a key figure of the 5 October 1910 revolution and prominent politician in the First Portuguese Republic. Carlos Melancia died on 23 October 2022, at the age of 95.<ref></ref>
